doc.after: An aircraft approaching a runway is guided by the ILS receivers in the aircraft by performing modulation depth comparisons Many aircraft can route signals into the autopilot to fly the approach automatically An ILS consists of two independent sub systems The localizer provides lateral guidance the glide slope provides vertical guidance
